Class DataTable<T>

java.lang.Object
io.mindspice.simplypages.core.HtmlTag
io.mindspice.simplypages.components.display.DataTable<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class DataTable<T> extends HtmlTag
DataTable component for displaying structured data from objects. Supports mapping Java objects to table rows with type-safe column definitions.

  • Field Summary

    • getChildrenStream

      protected Stream<Component> getChildrenStream()
      Description copied from class: HtmlTag
      Gets the stream of child components to be rendered.

      Subclasses can override this to provide a custom list of children, such as filtering empty components or enforcing a specific order.

      Overrides:
      getChildrenStream in class HtmlTag
      Returns:
      stream of components to render
